title: Angels won't write down your sins for 6 hours ( Minor sins or both minor & major? ) assim al hakeem
transcript: is the Hadith that the Angels won't record for the sin of the sins of a person who repented before six hours is this only for minor sins or major this is for both the Angels uplift the pen they do not register your sin for six hours if you happen to repent be remorseful ask Allah for forgiveness they will not record it otherwise they will write it down
